name: legionary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a soldier in an ancient Roman legion (= a large group of soldiers who form a part of an army): The legionaries were armed with swords. The knife handle was found in Colchester and may have been used by a legionary.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is not difficult to imagine legionaries marching along this track. Sergius was a Roman legionary who converted to Christianity.The legionaries took possession of whatever they wished.
